description: Variation of conditions 1 (approved plans), 4, 7 and 11 of planning permission dated 10th June 2022 (RN:21/07603/FULL) for the Excavation of basement beneath footprint of building and new side extension, replacement side extension at increased height plus addition of window and balcony, erection of new single storey side extension, replacement doors to rear and creation of window to side (north side), infill extension in part of front lightwell and installation of external stair in front lightwell, installation of plant equipment in front lightwell and rear garden and associated alterations. Namely, flank (south) window added; Steps incorporated to side passage (south elevation); Chimney added to north elevation; Formation of skylight; Previously approved rear balcony omitted and replaced with Juliet balcony; Basement footprint enlarged to north elevation; Lower ground floor extended at north-east corner to provide stair to basement: Front driveway level adjusted to align with garage; and access to rear garden from rear elevation revised.
